mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderinfo(odate,ano,status,price,invoice) VALUES(#{odate},#{ano},1,#{price},0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE odate=#{odate}
mapper.update: update orderinfo set status=#{status} where ono=#{ono}
mapper.select: SELECT ono,`status`,price FROM orderinfo WHERE date_format(odate,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT o.ono,odate,o.status,weight,o.price AS totalPrice ,ino,i.gno,nums,i.price ,gname,pics,CONCAT_WS(' ',province,city,area,addr) AS addr FROM orderinfo o,orderiteminfo i,goodsinfo g,addrinfo a WHERE o.ono=i.ono AND i.gno=g.gno AND o.ano=a.ano AND a.mno=#{_parameter} ORDER BY o.ono DESC
